info.title: Gun Del Sol API
info.description: High-performance async API for Solana token analysis (Modular)

get.description: Root endpoint - API information
Health check endpoint with WebSocket connection count
Get current debug mode status
Get debug configuration for frontend

Get current API settings

Returns:
    API settings dictionary

post.description:
Update API settings

Args:
    payload: Settings to update

Returns:
    Updated settings

Register a wallet address for monitoring

Args:
    payload: Address and optional note

Returns:
    Registration status and details

get.description:
Get list of all monitored addresses

Returns:
    Total count and list of addresses

Get details of a specific monitored address

Args:
    address: Solana wallet address

Returns:
    Address details

delete.description:
Remove an address from monitoring

Args:
    address: Solana wallet address

Returns:
    Deletion status

put.description:
Update the note for a monitored address

Args:
    address: Solana wallet address
    payload: New note text

Returns:
    Update status

post.description:
Import multiple addresses at once

Args:
    payload: List of address entries

Returns:
    Import summary

Clear all monitored addresses

Returns:
    Clearing status

Get all wallets with tags (Codex)
